      • map

        @JvmStatic
public static float map(float number,
                                   float in_min,
                                   float in_max,
                                   float out_min,
                                   float out_max)

        Maps a number from one range to another.

        Parameters:
        number - the number to map
        in_min - the original range min
        in_max - the original range max
        out_min - the final range min
        out_max - the final range max
        Returns:
        the re-mapped number
